head.title: Phillips Is Upbeat On Valentine Deal

hedline.hl1: Phillips Is Upbeat On Valentine Deal

block.p: Mets General Manager Steve Phillips echoed Manager Bobby Valentine's hope that Valentine will have a new Mets contract shortly after the season ends.
Phillips said yesterday that he would negotiate that deal once he gets his own new contract, which seems to be a formality.
Mets General Manager Steve Phillips echoed Manager Bobby Valentine's hope that Valentine will have a new Mets contract shortly after the season ends.
Phillips said yesterday that he would negotiate that deal once he gets his own new contract, which seems to be a formality.

''In reality, our No. 1 priority, once I get my deal done, will be to sign Bobby to a contract that's satisfactory to both parties,'' said Phillips, who has been told by the owners Nelson Doubleday and Fred Wilpon that they want him and Valentine back.
